title: Student Grades Dictionary
description: Create a program that uses a dictionary to store student grades. The program should allow users to add, remove, and update student grades. The dictionary should have student names as keys and a list of grades as values. The program should also calculate the average grade for each student.
sample_input: Add John 90 80 70, Add Jane 95 85 75, Remove John, Update Jane 98 88 78
